alert.note: Alert for Boone; Cabell; Kanawha; Lincoln; Mason; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:47AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Mason, eastern Cabell, Kanawha, Putnam, northern Lincoln and northern Boone Counties through 730 AM EDT... At 647 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Elkview to near Buffalo. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Winfield, Hamlin, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Hurricane, Sissonville, Milton, Chesapeake, Eleanor, Marmet, Belle, Buffalo, Cedar Grove, Poca, East Bank, and Glasgow. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 96 and 114. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 21 and 57. West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 76 and 95. Route 119 between mile markers 54 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Cabell; Kanawha; Lincoln; Mason; Putnam
